page.title: 04BADMINTON HORSE TRIALS.
page.content: The 1985 Badminton Horse Trials winner was Miss Virginia Holgate . She used two horses for the three day event.She was first on 'Priceless'and third on 'Nightcap'. These horse trials first began in 1949 and is now sponsored by Whitbread & Co.This sponsorship began in 1960 and the winning rider is presented with the Whitbread Trophy. First prize was Â£5,000. Second prize was Â£3,250. Third prize was Â£2,250. The Trophy and Prize Money are awarded to the owners of the horses. The owners of 'Priceless'and 'Nightcap'are British National Life Assurance.
